\dOkay Akira. Open up!\d%K%P
\dAaah...\d%K%P
\dHow is it?\d%K%P
\dDelicious as always.\d%K%P
\dGood. There's plenty more, so eat up.\d%K%P
A few days had passed since the wedding.%K%P
The wedding didn't really change a whole lot in our\nday-to-day life. All four of us got along like we\nalways had.%K%P
\dYou two are the only ones who believe that.\d%K%P
\dYeah! Kaede, how could you? You tyrant!\d%K%P
\dWell that's not very nice. What did I do?\d%K%P
\dIt's not what you 'did' but what you're still\ndoing!\d%K%P
Yukari pointed to my arm.%K%P
Kaede was tucked right up against me.%K%P
\dThat's unfairly close! You keep him away all to\nyourself!\d%K%P
\dThat's supposed to be my spot! I don't care if\nyour wedding came first!\d%K%P
\dYeah! Who cares if you had a wedding? We're\nsupposed to share Akira equally! You said so\nyourself!\d%K%P
\dOh you. You've got it all wrong. This is perfectly\nby the book, you know.\d%K%P
\dWe all have the same rights to Akira, but it's\nfirst come first served.\d%K%P
\dI've just claimed this spot first.\d%K%P
She clutched my arm and stuck her tongue out all\ncute-like at them, staking her claim.%K%P
Maybe I should take back that 'nothing's changed'\nstuff.%K%P
Kaede no longer pretended she didn't want me all to\nherself.%K%P
She was more honest about that than ever before.%K%P
\dWhy you! You're in for it now! Shion, we need to\nwork together!\d%K%P
\dYeah! It's our right as much as hers to get all\ncuddly!\d%K%P
\dWe need to free Akira from her grasp!\d%K%P
\dBring it on. Just don't think I'll go down easy.\d%K%P
After meeting me, Kaede had changed from a\nTatarigami into a true Goddess. Shion had come to\nus next, followed by Yukari.%K%P
Our meeting was nothing big at first, but before\nlong it led to this bizarre situation we now found\nourselves in.%K%P
I'd grown fond of the life we had now.%K%P
\dI-I thought we were in this together, Shion!\d%K%P
\dHe-he-hee! This was my plan all along! This side\nis mine!\d%K%P
\dI won't have it! Only one as well-endowed as me\nshould be at Akira's side!\d%K%P
\dNow you've gone too far! This means war!\d%K%P
\dLooks like their little army is now in a civil\nwar.\d%K%P
Okay, so maybe things were a bit too chaotic for my\ntastes, but what can a guy with three wives do?%K%P
\dHey, Akira.\d%K%P
\dWhat is it?\d%K%P
As I watched the other two fight it out, Kaede\nclosed in and stared into my eyes.%K%P
\dThis is fun, isn't it?\d%K%P
\dThe very definition of happiness, I'd say.\d%K%P
\dHey! No eye contact!\d%K%P
\dIf you're going to complain Yukuri, you should\ntry and get here first!\d%K%P
The sadness was long gone from the face of my\nfirst true love, and she at last smiled from the\nheart.%K%P
